## install required dependencies  
- npm i  
  
## start application (localhost:3000)  
- npm start  
  
## test application  
- npm test  
  
## generated files and directories  
- coverage directory  
- output_boundary_revised.txt  
- output_exception_revised.txt  
- output_revised.txt  
- Yaksha forum testcases.xml  
- resultForXml.json
